owl:Ontology.dc:creator: Florian Kleedorfer
owl:Ontology.dc:title: Web of Needs Authorization Vocabulary
owl:Ontology.terms:abstract: This vocabulary defines the terms used to express ACLs in WoN, as well as SHACL shapes for validating such ACLs.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Object properties of ASEs that have ASEs as their object.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: AseBranchProperty

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The relative or absolute reference to an atom.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: atom

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Used in the ASE root or atom messages expressions to specify a auth:AtomMessageExpression. The atom messages directly or transitively reachable from all target nodes become focus nodes of the atom message expression.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: atomMessage

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Used in the ASE root to specify a auth:AtomMessagesExpression. The atom message containers reachable from all target nodes become focus nodes of the atom messages expression.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: atomMessages

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Filters focus nodes of the ASE root by atom state.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: atomState

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Used in an Authorization to define constraints for tokens that if fulfilled, make their bearer a grantee.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: bearer

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Used in the ASE root, socket or connections expressions to specify a auth:ConnectionExpression. The connections directly or transitively reachable from all target nodes become focus nodes of the connection expression.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: connection

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Filters focus nodes of the connection expression by connection IRI.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: connectionIri

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Used in the ASE root, socket, connections, connection, or connection messages expressions to specify a auth:ConnectionMessageExpression. The connection messages directly or transitively reachable from all target nodes become focus nodes of the connection message expression.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: connectionMessage

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Used in the ASE root, socket, connections, or connection expressions to specify a auth:ConnectionMessagesExpression. The connection containers directly or transitively reachable from all target nodes become focus nodes of the connection messages expression.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: connectionMessages

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Filters focus nodes of the connection or connections expression by connection state.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: connectionState

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Used in the ASE root or socket expressions to specify a auth:ConnectionsExpression. The connection containers directly or transitively reachable from all target nodes become focus nodes of the connections expression.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: connections

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The decision (access granted or denied) made by evaluating the ACL.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: decision

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: An authorization defines the operations it grants in the form of an ASE tree annotated with auth:OperationExpressions using auth:grant.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: grant

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Used in an Authorization to define the set of grantees. Linking to an ASE root means that the targets of auth:TargetAtomExpressions are grantees. Linking to an atom expression means that the targets of the atom expression are grantees. Linking to a granteeWildcard means any client is a grantee.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: grantee

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Used in the ASE root to specify a auth:GraphExpression.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: graph

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Filters focus nodes of the graph expression by graph IRI.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: graphIri

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Filters focus nodes of the graph expression by graph type.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: graphType

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The token issued as the result of an ACL evaluation.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: issueToken

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: auth:issuer is used to link indicate who did, was asked to, or is required as the issuer of a token. Note that it is not required that the issuer is identical with the signer of a token. Unless the property `auth:nodeSigned true` is used, a token requested from an atom is signed by the WoN node on behalf of the atom. A token signed using the atom's private key can only be generated by the owner of the atom and thus involves a much more complex process to create.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: issuer

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Authorization that a socket requests its own atom to add to its `#socket-acl` graph when it is added to the atom.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: localAuth

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Allows an auth:MessageOperationExpression to specify msg:MessageTypes that the grantee of the operation may send __on behalf__ of the actual atom owner, at the operation's position in the atom's tree structure. The message types are either listed as objects of auth:messageOnBealf or defined transitively. In the latter case, the object of auth:messageOnBehalf is an auth:MessageTypeSet, which in turn lists message types.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: messageOnBehalf

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Allows an auth:MessageOperationExpression to specify msg:MessageTypes that the grantee of the operation may send __to__ the atom, at the operation's position in the atom's tree structure. The message types are either listed as objects of auth:messageTo or defined transitively. In the latter case, the object of auth:messageTo is an auth:MessageTypeSet, which in turn lists message types.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: messageTo

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Used in ASEs to enumerate operations granted for the ASE's position in the atom's tree structure. When checking for granted operations, operations are inherited by nested ASEs. An ASE can reject inheriting the granted operations using `auth:inherit false`.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: operation

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A TokenOperationExpression links to the specification of the requested token via auth:requestToken.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: requestToken

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Sockets may define auth:Authorizaitons for the atoms they are added to and for the target atoms of connections that are made via the socket. These Authorizations are added to the atom's `#socket-acl` graph. In order to be able to remove the authorizations again when a socket is removed from the atom, the authorization links to the socket using auth:requestedBy.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: requestedBy

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Used in the ASE root to specify a auth:SocketExpression. All sockets of the atom become focus nodes of the socket expression.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: socket

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Filters focus nodes of the socket expression by socket IRI (not to be confused with auth:socketType, which filters by IRI of the socket definition).
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: socketIri

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Filters focus nodes of the socket expression by socket definition IRI (not to be confused with auth:socketIri, which filters by IRI of the socket).
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: socketType

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Identifies target atoms of connections that are direct or transitive targetNodes of the expression's focus nodes.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: targetAtom

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Authorization that a socket requests the target atoms of its connections to add to their `#socket-acl` graphs upon establishing a connection.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: targetAuth

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The issuer of an actual token (either an atom uri or a won node uri).
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: tokenIss

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The subject of an actual token - the atom that requested it.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: tokenSub

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Class of all authorization evaluation results, specifying a) the decision, b) granted auth tokens (if any), c) authInfo (if any).
owl:Class.rdfs:label: AclEvalResult

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Class of all positions in the atom's tree structure
owl:Class.rdfs:label: AsePosition

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Class of the roots of ASE trees
owl:Class.rdfs:label: AseRoot

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An expression evaluating to an atom URI, either relative to some evaluation context or by its absolute URI.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: AtomExpression

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Class of all ASE that correspond to the atom message position in the atom tree structure.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: AtomMessageExpression

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Class of all ASE that correspond to the atom message container position in the atom tree structure.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: AtomMessagesExpression

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Class of all atom structure expressions (ASEs).
owl:Class.rdfs:label: AtomStructureExpression

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Class of all authentication tokens (when expressed in RDF, which makes sense for testing).
owl:Class.rdfs:label: AuthToken

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Class of authorizations in WoN. Authorizations combine definitions of __who__ is allowed __what__ and if they are not, under which circumstances they may learn how to obtain access (i.e., get __authInfo__).
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Authorization

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Class of all ASE that correspond to the connection position in the atom tree structure.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: ConnectionExpression

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Class of all ASE that correspond to the connection message position in the atom tree structure.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: ConnectionMessageExpression

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Class of all ASE that correspond to the connection message container position in the atom tree structure.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: ConnectionMessagesExpression

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Class of all ASE that correspond to the connection container position in the atom tree structure.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: ConnectionsExpression

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The class of autorization decisions (access denied or granted)
owl:Class.rdfs:label: DecisionValue

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Class of expected authorization evaluation results, specifying a) the decision, b) granted auth tokens (if any), c) authInfo (if any).
owl:Class.rdfs:label: ExpectedAclEvalResult

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Expresses that any client is a grantee.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: GranteeWildcard

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Class of all ASE that correspond to the graph position in the atom tree structure.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: GraphExpression

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Class of all auth:TreeExpressionShape instances that inherit allowed operations from their parent and are thus allowed to use the auth:inherit property to block inheritance.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: InheritingShape

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Class of all auth:OperationExpression instances that refer to sending messages.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: MessageOperationExpression

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Class of sets of msg:MessageType, identified by a resource, and listing message types via rdfs:member.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: MessageTypeSet

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Expresses that any message type is covered by an operation.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: MessageWildcard

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Class of all auth:TreeExpressionShape instances thay may link to auth:OperationExpression instances via auth:operation.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: OperationContainerShape

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Class of all WoN operations, such as reading the linked data representation of a resource, sending a message, etc.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: OperationExpression

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An expression evaluating to an atom URI relative to a given evaluation context.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: RelativeAtomExpression

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Class of all auth:OperationExpression instances that require no further defining properties beyond their identifier.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: SimpleOperation

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Class of all ASE that correspond to the socket position in the atom tree structure.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: SocketExpression

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Class of all auth:TreeExpressionShape instances thay may contain a target atom expression via auth:targetAtom.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: TargetAtomContainerShape

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Class of all auth:OperationExpression instances that refer to requesting an authentication token.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: TokenOperationExpression

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Class of all well-known token scopes. Using such scopes allows coordination across different domain ontologies.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: TokenScope

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Class of all definitions of token shapes, i.e. of specifications of the properties a token must have in order to be accepted.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: TokenShape

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Class of all definition of tokens to be granted or tokens requested.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: TokenSpecification

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Class of all SHACL shapes that specify atom structure expressions (ASEs).
owl:Class.rdfs:label: TreeExpressionShape

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: URI reserved for the value of the scope claim of owner tokens
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: OwnerToken

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: The requested operation is denied.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: accessDenied

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: The requested operation is granted.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: accessGranted

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: Graph type identifying all acl graphs of an atom (contains the ACLs, there is one `#acl` and one `#socket-acl` graph).
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: aclGraph

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: Placeholder for any atom URI in an atom expression, e.g. `[ auth:atom auth:anyAtom ]`
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: anyAtom

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: Any message type
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: anyMessageType

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: Any operation at all
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: anyOperation

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: Special wildcard matching any client - no credentials necessary. Example: `[ auth:grantee auth:anyone ; ... ]`
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: anyone

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: Placeholder for the URI of the socket that requests an operation via auth:localAuth, or of the local socket of the connection of which the target socket requests an operation via auth:targetAuth.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: authorizationRequestor

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: Graph type identifying all content graphs of an atom (contains user-generated information)
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: contentGraph

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: Implicit authorization granting an token with scope auth:OwnerToken to the atom's owner
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: grantOwnerTokenToOwner

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: Implicit authorization for closed connections
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: grantsForConnStateClosed

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: Implicit authorization for established connections
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: grantsForConnStateConnected

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: Implicit authorization for connections that have been requested by the partner but not yet established
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: grantsForConnStateRequestReceived

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: Implicit authorization for connections that have been requested by us but have not yet been accepted by the partner
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: grantsForConnStateRequestSent

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: Implicit authorization granting any operation to bearers of a valid token with scope auth:OwnerToken
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: grantsForOwnerTokenBearer

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: Graph type identifying the key graph of an atom (contains the public key)
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: keyGraph

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: Messages used in established connections
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: msgTypesCommunicate

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: Message types for establishing and closing a connection
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: msgTypesConnectClose

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: Hint message types
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: msgTypesHint

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: Message types that modify an atom
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: msgTypesModify

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: The 'operation' of auto-connecting an atom, i.e. automatically replying with a msg:ConnectMessage when a connection is requested. One could call this an inverse operation, being executed by the observed atom only for atoms that are granted the operation
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: opAutoConnect

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: The operation of communicating with an atom via a connection, i.e, sending such messages __to__ the atom
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: opCommunicate

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: The operations of communicating via a connection on behalf of an atom, i.e., not signed by the atom owner's key
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: opCommunicateOnBehalf

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: The operations of establishing or closing a connection or communicating via the connection on behalf of an atom, i.e., not signed by the atom owner's key
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: opConnectAndCommunicateOnBehalf

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: The operation of establishing or closing a connection with another atom, i.e., sending such messages __to__ the atom
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: opConnectClose

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: The operations of establishing or closing a connection on behalf of an atom, i.e., not signed by the atom owner's key
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: opConnectCloseOnBehalf

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: The operation of sending a hint message to an atom
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: opHint

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: The operation of modifying an atom on behalf of that atom, i.e., the message is not signed using the atom owner's key
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: opModifyOnBehalf

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: No operation - used where an operation is syntactically required but none should be allowed.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: opNop

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: The 'operation' of observing an atom, i.e. being informed of changes to its content or connections. One could call this an inverse operation, being executed by the observed atom only for atoms that are granted the operation
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: opObserve

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: The operation of reading a linked data resource
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: opRead

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: Placeholder for the uri of the atom that requests an operation. In the case of bearer authentication, there is no operationRequestor; arguably, one could use the token's subject claim, but that would extend additional trust to the issuer of the token.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: operationRequestor

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: Identifies the position of the __atom graph__ in the atom's tree structure
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: positionAtomGraph

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: Identifies the position of the __atom message__ in the atom's tree structure
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: positionAtomMessage

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: Identifies the position of the __atom message container__ in the atom's tree structure
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: positionAtomMessages

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: Identifies the position of the __connection__ in the atom's tree structure
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: positionConnection

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: Identifies the position of the __connection message__ in the atom's tree structure
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: positionConnectionMessage

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: Identifies the position of __connection message container__ in the atom's tree structure
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: positionConnectionMessages

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: Identifies the position of the __connection container__ in the atom's tree structure
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: positionConnections

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: Identifies the root of the atom's tree structure
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: positionRoot

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: Identifies the position of the __socket__ in the atom's tree structure
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: positionSocket

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: Placeholder for the atom's own URI in an atom expression, e.g. `[ auth:atom auth:self ]`.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: self

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: Graph type identifying the sysinfo graph of an atom (contains system-generated information)
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: sysinfoGraph

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Object properties that can be used to filter the focus nodes of ASE expressions.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: AseFilterDatatypeProperty

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Object properties that can be used to filter the focus nodes of ASE expressions.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: AseFilterProperty

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Object properties of ASEs that do not have ASEs as their object.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: AseLeafDatatypeProperty

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Object properties of ASEs that do not have ASEs as their object.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: AseLeafProperty

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Specifies the lifetime of a token in seconds.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: expiresAfter

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Atom structure expressions use `auth:inherit true` in order to not inherit granted operations from their parent expressions
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: inherit

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The date/time the token expires, according to the signer's clock.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tokenExp

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The date/time the token was issued, according to the signer's clock.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tokenIat

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Scope of an actual token, of a token to be granted, or required scope of a token to be accepted.

The auth:tokenScope property is used to annotate which scope value a token has, is requested with, or is required to have. Token scopes with URI values allow different socket definitions to collaborate: one socket adds an authorization to an atom granting a token with a specific scope URI, another socket specifies an authorization requiring a token with that scope URI (from a defined set of accepted issuers) in order to grant some operation.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tokenScope
